hooks.command: branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ "$branch" = "main" ] || [ "$branch" = "master" ]; then echo '{"block": true, "message": "Cannot edit files directly on main. Create a branch first: git checkout -b feat/my-feature"}' >&2; exit 2; fi
FILE_PATH=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$FILE_PATH" ]; then npx prettier --write "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
